name: Versatile Mage
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManga
content: He awoke, and the world was changed. The familiar high school now teaches magic, encouraging students to become the greatest magicians they can be. Beyond the city limits, wandering magical beasts prey on humans.An advanced scientific world changed into one with advanced magic.
